parameters.name: OrderId
parameters.description: The ID of the ticket. You can obtain the ticket ID from the response parameters of the [CreateSQLReviewOrder](~~257777~~) operation.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the ID of the tenant.
